name: Blob Monster
description:
Run for your life! There's a monster loose! Dr Doofenshmirtz has struck again!  Blob Monster is a twin-stick eat-'em-up set in downtown NYC. You take control of the aforementioned goopy villain and eat as much as you can in order to stay alive. Benches, umbrellas, plants, no inanimate object is safe from your sticky mitts.

This game REQUIRES a controller

Xbox 1 & DS4 compatible

Aim one arm with each stick

Grab with the bumpers & pull objects & yourself around

Hold 'X' or 'A' to restart after a round is over

Special powerups spawn rarely so be sure to watch out for them! They can give you advantages like stronger arms or more time!

Try to get a high score, but most importantly, have fun!
